entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
